title: What the Heck is Going on With the Vote in Michigan? (Ep 1396)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the explosive new details about the 2020 election abomination. The information coming out of Michigan and Georgia is horrifying. 

News Picks:


Watch: Ted Cruz takes a blowtorch to the tech tyrants on Capitol Hill.


President Trump fires official who failed to disclose information about Dominion. 

An election disaster in Wayne County is surfacing.


Huge problems with the vote tally in Michigan begin to emerge.


Detroit has had issues with its vote count before, check this out.


Second Georgia county finds uncounted Trump votes. 

The media sets its sights on Parler and substack.
